R - OPCODE - 11 bit
  - Rm	     5 bit
  - Shamt    6 bit
  - Rn       5 bit
  - rd       5 bit
:
ADD R3, R1, R2
10001011000 00010 000000 00001 00011
SUB R3, R1, R2
11001011000 00010 000000 00001 00011
ORR R3, R1, R2
10101010000 00010 000000 00001 00011
AND R3, R1, R2
10001010000 00010 000000 00001 00011

Shifts:
LSL R8, R8, #1
11010011011 00000 000001 01000 01000
LSR R0, R1, #4
11010011010 00000 000100 00001 00000

LSR R8, R8, #1
11010011010 00000 000001 01000 01000

ASR R7, R7, #1
11010011100 00000 000001 00111 00111
